ESRS E1-4 Targets related to climate change mitigation and adaptation
Question ID 206 - Climate-related targets
Release date
March 2024
Compilation of Explanations January—November 2024 Page 115 of 278
ESRS Implementation Q&A Platform – Compilation of Explanations January – November 2024
Question asked
Is it an absolute requirement in paragraph 30 that 90-95% of GHG emission reduction needs to be
performed before giving the option to work with GHG Removals?
Key Terms
